message.content:
1. Non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDS) and steroids have apparent interactions.
2. These interactions are between their mechanisms of action.
3. Co-therapy of NSAIDS and steroids may provide beneficial inflammatory relief.
4. Co-therapy of NSAIDS and steroids may provide beneficial pain relief.
5. This relief can occur in the absence of side effects.

messages.content:
Statement: The apparent interactions between the mechanisms of action of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDS) and steroids suggest that co-therapy may provide beneficial inflammatory and pain relief in the absence of side effects.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
